casebody.data:
In the Matter of DONAHOE’S, INCORPORATED, Debtor. In the Matter of GEO. K. STEVENSON COMPANY, Debtor; Donahoe’s, Incorporated Preferred and Class A Stockholders’ Protective Association, Appellant. No. 7237. Circuit Court of Appeals, Third Circuit. Nov. 27, 1939. Rehearing Denied Jan. 10, 1940. Louis S. Posner, of New York City, and Reich & Reich and Eli E. Reich, all of Pittsburgh, Pa., for petitioners. Stewart Lynch, of Wilmington, Del., for appellees.

Before MARIS, BIDDLE, and JONES, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Upon consideration of the motion of counsel for the debtors, it is hereby ordered that the appeal in the. above entitled matter be,'.and the same is hereby dismissed.
